# The Story

## Scene One

The morning sun rose over the quiet village, casting long shadows across the cobblestone streets.

Maria woke to the sound of church bells, knowing today would change everything.

She dressed quickly and gathered her belongings.

## Scene Two

The train station was busier than expected. Travelers rushed past with their luggage, faces set with determination.

She found her platform and waited.

The train arrived precisely on time.

## Scene Three

Through the window, the countryside blurred into streaks of green and gold.

Maria pulled out the letter and read it one more time.

The journey had begun.
